text: Viktor Rjaksinski (born 17 October 1967 in Kremenchuk) is a Soviet and Ukrainian former cyclist. ==Palmares== ;1990 :2nd Overall Cinturón a Mallorca :3rd Overall Tour du Hainaut ;1991 :1st 20px World Amateur Road Race Championships :1st Overall Peace Race ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:People from Kremenchuk Category:Ukrainian male cyclists Category:Soviet male cyclists Category:Vuelta a España cyclists
title: Viktor Rjaksinski
